sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Many modern threats bypass antivirus software by hiding in trusted folders, memory, or scheduled tasks.
Malware can silently log keystrokes, steal browser data, or join your device to a botnet without obvious symptoms.
Some infections persist even after reboot or factory reset if the malware is embedded.

sections.heading: What We Do
items: Identify and remove viruses, spyware, rootkits, and fileless malware using trusted tools
Analyze startup behavior, background processes, and system anomalies
Inspect installed applications, browser extensions, and scheduled tasks for hidden threats
Restore system stability and performance without wiping your data
Apply system hardening with DNS filtering, safer software defaults, and privacy-focused antivirus

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: We connect or visit, run a deep malware inspection, and isolate known threats. Then we secure your system using non-invasive tools and best practices. You keep your files, we remove the risk.
